Localization.Name: RAMP Corporation
Localization.Description: Manufacturer of consumer and pro-grade ship components, RAMP Corp sponsors the Team RAMP M50 racing team.

English.Name: RAMP Corporation
English.Description: Manufacturer of consumer and pro-grade ship components, RAMP Corp sponsors the Team RAMP M50 racing team.

Localization.Name: Bolt
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RAMP Corporation
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Stealth

The RAMP Corporation continues their line of low emission quantum drives with the Bolt. This medium-sized component will blast you from one location to the next while producing a minimal signature.
